content: this pattern is for beachside shorts that make a fun summer project for a day at the beach or to wear around the house the pattern works for any size and gives general measurements for sizes xs-3xl you can use any worsted weight yarn you like and will use about 420 yards based on the size example in the pattern in the pattern 1 and 1/3 skeins are used to create this piece but it depends on the sizing of your shorts i hope you all enjoy this pattern and if you have any questions feel free to comment or message me on instagram any feedback is appreciated please share your creations with me on instagram @yarn and things
